original_content:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business needs and technical solutions, requiring a unique blend of business acumen and technical proficiency. As a key player in our organization, you will be responsible for understanding complex business processes and translating them into efficient and effective system configurations. Your ability to collaborate with stakeholders, analyze data, and identify opportunities for improvement will be essential in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business requirements and operate at an optimal level.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed business requirements and document them using industry-standard techniques like user stories, use cases, and process flows.
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues.
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, leveraging tools like database querying, reporting, and data visualization.
- Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through configuration changes and the implementation of best practices.
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT).
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing system maintenance and improvement.
- Collaborate with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure the smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to effectively understand and address complex business challenges
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills to work effectively with stakeholders from various departments
- Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in working with databases and querying tools to analyze data and generate insights

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with Java programming language
- Expertise in SQL for data manipulation and reporting

Required Experience:
- Proven track record of successfully implementing machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) solutions to drive business improvements
- Demonstrated experience in the vehicle configuration space, leveraging technical solutions to address complex business needs

Preferred Experience:
- Experience with Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, collaborative environment
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration processes and systems

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend configuration tools
- Data analysis and visualization tools (e.g., SQL, Tableau, Power BI)
- Agile project management software (e.g., Jira, Trello)

Work Environment & Expectations:
This role will require close collaboration with cross-functional teams, including business stakeholders, developers, and IT support. You will be expected to work in an Agile environment, participating in regular meetings, demonstrations, and retrospectives. Strong communication and the ability to translate technical concepts into business-friendly language will be crucial for success in this role.

Role Overview:
This role is a critical link between our organization's business objectives and the technical solutions that enable them. As a highly skilled professional, you will be responsible for understanding complex business processes, translating them into effective system configurations, and driving continuous improvement through data-driven insights. Your ability to bridge the gap between business and technology will be essential in ensuring our systems accurately reflect evolving needs and operate at peak efficiency.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed business requirements, leveraging techniques like user stories, use cases, and process flows to document them clearly and concisely.
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues.
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, utilizing database querying, reporting, and data visualization tools to generate actionable insights.
- Proactively identify ways to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through configuration changes and the implementation of industry best practices.
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate the solutions.
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing system maintenance and future enhancements.
- Work in close collaboration with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure the seamless implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to effectively understand and address complex business challenges
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills to work effectively with stakeholders from various departments
- Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in working with databases and querying tools to analyze data and generate meaningful insights

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java programming language
- Expertise in SQL for data manipulation, reporting, and analysis

Required Experience:
- Proven track record of successfully implementing machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) solutions to drive business improvements
- Demonstrated experience in the vehicle configuration space, leveraging technical solutions to address complex business needs

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working in an Agile environment and applying Agile methodologies to project delivery
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration processes and systems, including their impact on broader business operations

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend configuration tools
- Data analysis and visualization tools (e.g., SQL, Tableau, Power BI)
- Agile project management software (e.g., Jira, Trello)

Work Environment & Expectations:
This role will require you to work closely with cross-functional teams, including business stakeholders, developers, and IT support. You will be expected to thrive in an Agile environment, actively participating in regular meetings, demonstrations, and retrospectives. Strong communication skills and the ability to translate technical concepts into business-friendly language will be crucial for success in this role, as you will be a key bridge between the business and technology domains.

Role Overview:
As a highly skilled professional in this role, you will be responsible for bridging the gap between our organization's business objectives and the technical solutions that enable them. With your unique blend of business acumen and technical proficiency, you will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect evolving business needs and operate at peak efficiency. Your ability to collaborate with stakeholders, analyze data, and identify opportunities for improvement will be instrumental in driving continuous process optimization and system enhancements.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to understand their business requirements, gather detailed information, and document them using industry-standard techniques like user stories, use cases, and process flows.
- Translate the documented business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues.
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, leveraging database querying, reporting, and data visualization tools to generate actionable insights that drive business decisions.
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through the implementation of configuration changes and industry best practices.
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate the solutions.
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing system maintenance and future enhancements.
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure the seamless implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to effectively understand and address complex business challenges
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills to work effectively with stakeholders from various departments
- Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in working with databases and querying tools to analyze data and generate meaningful insights

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java programming language
- Expertise in SQL for data manipulation, reporting, and analysis

Required Experience:
- Proven track record of successfully implementing machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) solutions to drive business improvements
- Demonstrated experience in the vehicle configuration space, leveraging technical solutions to address complex business needs

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working in an Agile environment and applying Agile methodologies to project delivery
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration processes and systems, including their impact on broader business operations

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend configuration tools
- Data analysis and visualization tools (e.g., SQL, Tableau, Power BI)
- Agile project management software (e.g., Jira, Trello)

Work Environment & Expectations:
This role will require you to collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including business stakeholders, developers, and IT support, in an Agile environment. You will be expected to actively participate in regular meetings, demonstrations, and retrospectives, demonstrating strong communication skills and the ability to translate technical concepts into business-friendly language. Your role as a key bridge between the business and technology domains will be essential in driving continuous process optimization and system enhancements.
